attributes.additional_details:
To ensure all students are educated on:

* Basic Life Skills - How to grow food, how to build
houses, how to recycle water.

* Engineering (given that we now have a society completely dependant on technology, in which very few know how to make or fix technological goods)

* Universal Mechanics - How the mechanics of the universe, our planet, that which inhabits our planet and, of course, ourselves work(ego and consciousness). Without this, we spend our lives in a constant search for happiness, when happiness is found in the momentary experiential knowledge that we are always connected to everything, and we are nothing without everything (Everything is equally reliant on everything else to exist)

These basic principles are vital for growth in the areas of self-government, true civility, logic and love. With them, we no longer need the current institutions attempting to create, or force, civility; government, law and money.

Thank you, and love to all.
